text:
I would like to be a journalist and more especially a reporter. I don't have an inspiration because of one person but this is the situations which inspired me. The reporters inspired me but not one person, it's all of them. As a matter of fact, it's the fact that they can travel all around the world in order to do their job which give me the idea to do the same thing. Plus, I am particularly interessed by the geopolitic. So, I want to know and understand all the things which happened in the world and I want to report their in order to allow the people to understand this. That's what all reporter and journalist did and do today. I love view documentaries about what happened in the world and which explain what happened. That inspired me because of I would like to do the same thing, maybe it will be with photos or videos or it might be both. This is not exactly a situation or the journalists who inspired me, this is the production of them. In fact, the job of journalist inspired me, the situation and the journalists will inspired my works and how I work. Alex Dupont and nothing inspired me in the choice of my study. I found this seeking what kind of study will allow me to be a journalist. So this is the job who inspired me in the choice of my study.
 This webpage performs keylogging of input typed into a textbox. In other words, when focused on the textbox below, the page will record each time you hit a key or select text with your mouse. All of the data is stored locally on your machine in the DOM and is downloadable as a JSON file. More information about the motivation of this project and the format of the produced data are available here.
